subject: Re: Telehealth and Remote Support LAM catalogue file update

Hope this makes sense.

action.text: Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
@glen Can you please add these to the https://phonakmarketing.com.au/local-marketing/ page? You will need to create the new categories as the client has requested please:

'Telehealth marketing guide'
'Getting started guides'
'MyPhonak app privacy statement'
'Website banners'
'Social content'

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:

The other files can be categorized as follows and in this order:
